definition: The term "Ertrag" refers to the outcome or result obtained from a particular activity, typically associated with the productivity or yield of something. It is commonly used in the context of agriculture, economics, or business to describe the return or profit generated from an investment, venture, or harvest.

examples.german: Der Ertrag der Ernte war dieses Jahr besonders hoch.
examples.english: The yield of the harvest was particularly high this year.

examples.german: Der Ertrag der Investitionen ist noch ungewiss.
examples.english: The return on investments is still uncertain.

examples.german: Die Firma erzielt einen hohen Ertrag.
examples.english: The company generates a high profit.

examples.german: Der Ertrag der Aktien ist gestiegen.
examples.english: The return on stocks has increased.

examples.german: Der Ertrag der Anlage ist enttäuschend.
examples.english: The yield of the investment is disappointing.
